title: Reddit Co-Founder Alexis Ohanian Selling Brooklyn Condo for $2.3M
text:
Located in beautiful Brooklyn Heights, the two-bedroom, two-bathroom unit features 1,385 square feet of living space, 13-foot-high ceilings, and oversized windows.

The light-filled living area adjoins the cooking and dining space. The custom Italian kitchen comes with a quartz island with bar seating, high-end appliances, and wood cabinetry.

The primary bedroom offers views of the harbor and Manhattan skyline, and the connected bath comes with a terrazzo-tiled shower, a free-standing tub, and a double vanity.

The second bedroom has pocket doors and could be used as an office or media room.

The unit features oak floors, a washer-dryer unit, and closet space. There's a storage cage on the same floor.

Built in 1928, the pet-friendly condo building offers residents access to a gym, yoga studios, golf simulator, screening room, and music room. There's also door staff, porters, and concierge service. Garage parking spaces can be rented or purchased.

A shuttle to the local subways is available, as well as a ferry to Wall Street.

The building is surrounded by a new 85-acre park that borders the water. The green space includes playing fields, sport courts, playgrounds, and running and bike paths. There's even calm water for kayaking or canoeing.

Luxury life in Florida

Ohanian, a Brooklyn native, co-founded the popular discussion and news aggregation site Reddit in 2005. He left the company in 2009 and resigned from the company's board in 2020.

Ohanian married tennis legend Serena Williams in 2017. The couple and their daughter are now based in Florida, where they live in a waterfront, Miami-area mansion that Serena's sister Venus Williams helped design.

As featured in Architectural Digest, the ultramodern, minimalist space boasts an art gallery, wine cellar, gym, and pool.

In 2021, Serena placed her Beverly Hills, CA, home on the market for just under $7.5 million. The listing is currently off-market.

This story was originally published on Realtor.com.

Reddit Co-Founder Alexis Ohanian Selling Brooklyn Condo for $2.3M
